parameters.A1: Am indifferent to the feelings of others. (q_146)
parameters.O3: Carry the conversation to a higher level. (q_492)
parameters.E2: Find it difficult to approach others. (q_901)
parameters.C3: Do things according to a plan. (q_619)
parameters.O5: Will not probe deeply into a subject. (q_1964)
parameters.C4: Do things in a half-way manner. (q_626)
parameters.education: 1 = HS, 2 = finished HS, 3 = some college, 4 = college graduate 5 = graduate degree

reference: The first 25 items are organized by five putative factors: Agreeableness, Conscientiousness, Extraversion, Neuroticism, and Opennness.  The scoring key is created using  make.keys, the scores are found using  score.items.
description:
Description
25 personality self report items taken from the International Personality Item Pool (ipip.ori.org) were included as part of the Synthetic Aperture Personality Assessment (SAPA) web based personality assessment project.  The data from 2800 subjects are included here as a demonstration set for scale construction, factor analysis, and Item Response Theory analysis.  Three additional demographic variables (sex, education, and age) are also included.
title: 25 Personality items representing 5 factors
format: A data frame with 2800 observations on the following 28 variables. (The q numbers are the SAPA item numbers).
